backend/main.mo: Main actor with user profiles, video ideas, hashtags management, authorization system via MixinAuthorization, and publication state toggle (published/unpublished) restricted to admins.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module that adds publicationState field (defaulting to #published) to existing actor state while preserving userProfiles, videoIdeas, and hashtags data.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting four implemented features: staff access button, staff code verification (2807), publish/unpublish toggle, and unpublished state overlay across pages.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Summaries of frontend files including components for staff code dialog, unpublished overlay, video/hashtag management, calendar view, settings page with moderation controls, and React Query hooks for backend operations.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS styles with OKLCH color system defining light and dark mode variables for background, foreground, primary, secondary, destructive, borders, and chart colors.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with viewport meta tag, 'TikTok Companion' title, root div, and module script loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root application component with TanStack Router setup, ThemeProvider, Toaster, and routes for landing, dashboard, calendar, hashtags, and settings pages with AuthGuard protection.
frontend/src/components/AuthGuard.tsx: Authentication guard component that redirects unauthenticated users to landing page, shows loading states, and displays ProfileSetup modal for users without profiles.
frontend/src/components/CalendarView.tsx: Calendar grid component displaying month view with day names, navigation controls, and scheduled videos rendered on their respective dates with click handlers.
frontend/src/components/HashtagCard.tsx: Displays a hashtag in a card with usage count, creation date, and a copy-to-clipboard button that appears on hover.
frontend/src/components/HashtagForm.tsx: Form component for adding new hashtags with automatic '#' prefix handling and loading states.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Main layout component with header navigation, mobile menu, authentication-aware routing to Ideas/Calendar/Hashtags, and settings dropdown.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Authentication button that handles Internet Identity login/logout with loading states and query cache clearing.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetup.tsx: First-time user onboarding form that collects the user's name and creates their profile.
frontend/src/components/ScheduleDialog.t: Dialog for scheduling video ideas to specific dates, showing only unscheduled draft videos with calendar date picker.
Password-protected dialog that verifies staff access with hardcoded code '2807' for moderation controls.
frontend/src/components/UnpublishedOverl: Full-screen overlay that displays a maintenance message when the app is unavailable.
frontend/src/components/VideoIdeaCard.ts: Card component displaying video idea details with status badge, hashtags, scheduled date, edit button, and delete option for drafts.
frontend/src/components/VideoIdeaForm.ts: Form component for creating/editing video ideas with title, description, and hashtags fields. Handles validation, submission via useAddVideoIdea mutation, and displays loading states.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React Query hook that creates and manages the backend actor instance with authentication via Internet Identity. Invalidates dependent queries when actor changes and initializes access control with admin token.
frontend/src/hooks/useGetCallerUserProfi: React Query hook that fetches the current authenticated user's profile from the backend actor. Returns loading states and the UserProfile data.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context provider and hook for Internet Identity authentication, managing login/logout flow, identity state, and AuthClient lifecycle. Provides authentication status and identity to child components.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for data fetching and mutations including user profiles, video ideas (CRUD operations), scheduling, and hashtags. Each mutation invalidates relevant query caches on success.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for light/dark theme color palettes using coral/orange/teal scheme. Includes utility classes for gradient backgrounds.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React root with QueryClientProvider for React Query and InternetIdentityProvider for authentication context.
frontend/src/pages/Calendar.tsx: Calendar page component displaying scheduled videos in a monthly view with stats, schedule dialog for adding videos, and unpublished state overlay. Fetches videos by date range and manages dialog state.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Main dashboard page displaying video ideas organized by status (draft, scheduled, published) with tabs, search, and CRUD operations. Shows an unpublished overlay when the app is in maintenance mode.
frontend/src/pages/Hashtags.tsx: Hashtag management page with search functionality, allowing users to add, view, and organize hashtags for TikTok content. Includes empty state handling and unpublished overlay support.
frontend/src/pages/Landing.tsx: Landing page with hero section, feature highlights, and call-to-action buttons. Auto-redirects authenticated users to dashboard and displays unpublished overlay when needed.
frontend/src/pages/Settings.tsx: Settings page with staff-only moderation controls including publication state toggle (published/unpublished). Requires staff code verification stored in sessionStorage.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for extracting and managing URL parameters from both query strings and hash-based routing, with sessionStorage persistence support for maintaining state across navigation.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration file that defines custom theme extensions including color schemes using OKLCH color space, typography fonts (Inter, Poppins), custom animations, shadows, and responsive container settings.
project_state.json: Project state metadata tracking 11 implemented features for a TikTok content management dashboard, including video idea tracking, Internet Identity authentication, content calendar, hashtag tracker, and moderation system with known build issues.
